t: Amazon.com: ​​​​PopSockets Phone Grip with Expanding Kickstand, Adhesive Grip - Black : Cell Phones & Accessories
s: I think the are a little pricey,but the cheaper brands do stick as long or as good so I’ll take this. The adhesive strength is great and I like that it pushes down when not in use. Just remember to get the changeable ones if you like to switch them often. I got my phone case off a different site and was excited to see Amazon had an exact matching pop socket to go with it. I love the design and build quality! ... Ich war eigentlich immer ein Gegner von den Popsockets...
